Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell-micro-gas turbine (SOFC-MGT) hybrid power plants integrate a solid oxide fuel cell and a micro-gas turbine and can achieve efficiencies of over 60% even for small power outputs (200-500 kW).
Titulo: Externally reformed solid oxide fuel cell-micro-gas turbine (SOFC-MGT) hybrid systems fueled by methanol and di-methyl-ether (DME)

Sentencas: The SOFC-MGT systems currently developed are fueled with natural gas, which is reformed inside the same stack, but the use of alternative fuels can be an interesting option.
Titulo: Externally reformed solid oxide fuel cell-micro-gas turbine (SOFC-MGT) hybrid systems fueled by methanol and di-methyl-ether (DME)

Sentencas: in particular, as the reforming temperature of methanol and di-methyl-ether (DME) (200-350 degrees C) is significantly lower than that of natural gas (700-900 degrees C), the reformer can be sited outside the stack.
Titulo: Externally reformed solid oxide fuel cell-micro-gas turbine (SOFC-MGT) hybrid systems fueled by methanol and di-methyl-ether (DME)

Sentencas: External reforming in SOFC-MGT plants fueled by methanol and DME enhances efficiency due to improved exhaust heat recovery and higher voltage produced by the greater hydrogen partial pressure at the anode inlet.
Titulo: Externally reformed solid oxide fuel cell-micro-gas turbine (SOFC-MGT) hybrid systems fueled by methanol and di-methyl-ether (DME)

Sentencas: The study carried out in this paper shows that the main operating parameters of the fuel reforming section (temperature and steam-to-carbon ratio (SCR)) must be carefully chosen to optimise the hybrid plant performance.
Titulo: Externally reformed solid oxide fuel cell-micro-gas turbine (SOFC-MGT) hybrid systems fueled by methanol and di-methyl-ether (DME)

Sentencas: For the stoichiometric SCR values, the optimum reforming temperature for the methanol fueled hybrid plant is approximately 240 degrees C, giving efficiencies of about 67-68% with a SOFC temperature of 900 degrees C (the efficiency is about 72-73% at 1000 degrees C).
Titulo: Externally reformed solid oxide fuel cell-micro-gas turbine (SOFC-MGT) hybrid systems fueled by methanol and di-methyl-ether (DME)

Sentencas: Similarly, for DME the optimum reforming temperature is approximately 280 degrees C with efficiencies of 65% at 900 degrees C (69% at 1000 degrees C).
Titulo: Externally reformed solid oxide fuel cell-micro-gas turbine (SOFC-MGT) hybrid systems fueled by methanol and di-methyl-ether (DME)
Externally reformed solid oxide fuel cell-micro-gas turbine (SOFC-MGT) hybrid systems fueled by methanol and di-methyl-ether (DME)

Sentencas: As too small SCRs can lead to carbon formation, practical SCR values are around one for methanol and 1.5-2 for DME.
Titulo: Externally reformed solid oxide fuel cell-micro-gas turbine (SOFC-MGT) hybrid systems fueled by methanol and di-methyl-ether (DME)
